Parameters: View: the view from which the child was removed
View: the child removed from the hierarchy
onChildViewRemoved(android.view.View,and.Description: Called when a child is removed from a parent view.
onChildViewRemoved(android.view.View,and.FullName: public abstract void onChildViewRemoved (View parent, View child)

Parameters: View: the view in which a child was added
View: the new child view added in the hierarchy
onChildViewAdded(android.view.View,andro.Description: Called when a new child is added to a parent view.
onChildViewAdded(android.view.View,andro.FullName: public abstract void onChildViewAdded (View parent, View child)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the hierarchy within this view changed. The hierarchy changes whenever a child is added to or removed from this view.
